channel.title: Why people cant connect?
channel.description: Hello..Im using mithscape 508 source right now(im looking for a empty palidino76 source) and me friends cant connect..Im saying them hamachi nick+pass and they using Umairscape ipchanger(for 508s) i have everythink running and when they tipe my hamachi ip client dont load.. can anyone help me ?

item.title: Why people cant connect?
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

did the box popup & ask for the server ip? If not then they have to edit the files in the client folder to do it manually.

Read full topic

item.title: Why people cant connect?
item.dc:creator: @neXuscoder neXuscoder
item.description:
@neXuscoder wrote:

[quote=“zane02, post:2, topic:331037”]tell them your hamachi network & password
once they join your network tell them to copy the ip address from your hamachi
then tell them to put that for the server ip

The server must be online first for it to work, if it was offline when they added the ip tell them to close the client & reopen one.[/quote]
Im+they already done this bu they client stuck at : Connecting to update server or somethink like this

Read full topic

item.title: Why people cant connect?
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

tell them your hamachi network & password
once they join your network tell them to copy the ip address from your hamachi
then tell them to put that for the server ip

The server must be online first for it to work, if it was offline when they added the ip tell them to close the client & reopen one.

Read full topic

item.title: Why people cant connect?

item.description:
